text:
Trending on Billboard

Billboard can officially confirm that Ludacris and Vanessa Hudgens will be the co-hosts of this year’s Billboard Music Awards.

This will be Ludacris’ fourth straight year in the role. Hudgens will replace last year’s co-host, Ciara, in her first time in the position. Hudgens took to Instagram to celebrate the announcement, writing “I’m so unbelievably excited to host the @BBMAs this year with @Ludacris!“

Be sure to watch the Billboard Music Awards next Sunday, May 21 on ABC at 8 p.m. ET/5 p.m. PT.
